sentences.sContent: There was a pause while Alice changed the tape.
sentences.sCn: 艾丽斯换磁带的时候出现了短暂的停顿。

phrases.pCn: 踌躇；停下来好好想一想

remMethod.val: 音乐播放器上的P， 一个代表播放(Play)， 一个代表暂停(Pause)

trans.tranOther: to stop speaking or doing something for a short time before starting again
a short time during which someone stops speaking or doing something before starting again
